Kevin Cotellesso

Articulated Compliant Gripper

Mechanical Design / 2025

About this Project

I implemented an alternate design methodology for compliant mechanisms that mimic rigid-body mechanisms. This approach involves replacing rigid linkages with thick sections and joints with thin “hinge” areas. This methodology is well suited for replacing sprung rigid mechanisms, since the material’s deformation acts as a spring pushing it back to its manufactured position.


Relevant Skills

  • 3D Printing: Developed slicer settings to print flexible filament with minimal stringing and blobbing
  • Mechanism Design: Used 2D kinematics to design and estimate the motion of continuously deformable mechanisms
  • Rapid Prototyping and Development
